basic.description: This course examines issues in Feminist Philosophy. Possible topics may include gender and sex; feminist ethics, epistemologies and metaphysics; disputes about essentialism; the intersections of gender, sexuality, racialization, imperialism, and class.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Topics in Feminist Philosophy

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a PHIL Major or Medial Plan and (a minimum GPA of 2.60 in PHIL250 and PHIL257) and (6.0 units in PHIL).
